dialogueLines.line: What, no! How could I lose?
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: I'm supposed to be superior to you second dimension animals!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: So, are you going to send us back home?
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Fine, I'm not above breaking my promises.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: So Boyfriend, as I was saying, do you want to get burgers after this?
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: Yeah, I'm in the mood for burgers.
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Wanna go to WcDonalds with us and try their Big Wacs?
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: ...Alright, I'll humor you. You and your inferior second dimension food.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: I'll try one of these...burgers...you speak of.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma
